attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we have all noticed, particually in our pockets, the cost of Pertol and Diesel has rised. Im am hear by asking Downing Street to lower the tax we pay on our fuel so that we can try and bring the cost back down to under the pound. 

Other wise other cuts for the cost of driving should be made, such as cuts i the congestion charge or the annual road tax.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
